welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bresso, a charming city with a rich history and delicious cuisine. Get ready to experience the beauty and culture of Italy while strolling through our streets and indulging in our famous gelato. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
